page.description: The .TEXTSELECT() method selects text in a control starting at Start_Position and running for Length characters.
page.syntax: .TEXTSELECT( Start_Position as N [, Length as N [, Processed as L ]] )

argument.name: Start_Position
argument.description: The beginning character to select. The first character is number 1.

argument.name: Length
argument.description: Optional. Default = 0. The number of characters to select. Enter -1 to select all characters.

page.example: dim ptr as P dim fld as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.show() fld = ptr.Child("Lastname") fld.TextSelect(1,-1) ' selects all text fld.TextSelect(3, 2) ' selects characters 3 and 4
